actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to direct Governmental instrumentalities not to require nonessential declarations of marital status or the nonessential use of prefixes indicating such status.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits instrumentalities of the Federal Government from requiring nonessential declarations of marital status or the nonessential use of prefixes indicating such status, in connection with (1) carrying on of correspondence, (2) keeping of records, (3) filing of any written instrument as an application for employment, or (4) issuance of any certificate, document, or other written instrument.

titles.title: A bill to direct Governmental instrumentalities not to require nonessential declarations of marital status or the nonessential use of prefixes indicating such status.
